Distribution.Description: Linux Users Association Pardus Corporate 2 Contrib Repository
Linux Kullanıcıları Derneği Pardus Kurumsal 2 Katkı Deposu

Source.Name: xchat
Source.Description: X-chat allows you to join multiple IRC channels (chat rooms) at the same time, talk publicly, private one-on-one conversations etc. Even file transfers are possible.
X-chat birden fazla IRC kanalına (sohbet odasına) aynı anda girmenize, herkesle beraber ya da özel başbaşa konuşmalara olanak tanır. Dosya aktarımları bile mümkündür.

Update.Comment: Add package description, update Turkish summary, tidy file paths.
Update.Name: Doruk Fişek

Update.Comment: - Use g_ascii string functions to not working irc commands. - Enable shared libsexy support instead of gtkspell.
Update.Name: Burak Çalışkan

Update.Comment: Add patch to fix crash when transparent background is set.
Update.Name: Eren Türkay

Source.Name: glpng
Source.Description: A library for OpenGL to load PNG graphics files as an OpenGL texture as easily as possible. It also has a number of options for generating the alpha channel and mipmaps.
PNG grafik dosyalarını bir OpenGL dokusu olarak olabildiğince kolay bir biçimde yüklemek için bir kitaplık. Alfa kanal ve MIP haritası oluşturmak için de seçenekleri bulunuyor.

Source.Name: freealut
Source.Description: Boîte à outils utilitaire d'OpenAL.
freealut is a free implementation of OpenAL's ALUT standard.
freealut, OpenAL'nin ALUT standardının özgür bir uyarlamasıdır.
Die OpenAL Werkzeugsammlung

Update.Comment: Depend on new openal Backup archive
Update.Name: Onur Küçük

Update.Comment: Build with shared openal, disable static, fix m4
Update.Name: Onur Küçük

Source.Name: quesoglc
Source.Description: A free implementation of the OpenGL Character Renderer (GLC).
OpenGL Karakter Yorumlayıcı ve Çizicisi (GLC) olabilen özgür bir kitaplık.

Source.Name: aucdtect
Source.Description: auCDtect is a console tool for analyzing the spectral characteristics of audio files and determining if they have been compressed with using codecs. It is useful for checking if a compact disc has been recorded using MP3 files or from an original source. Tests shows that it is more than 95% accurate.

auCDtect, ses dosyalarının tayf karakteristiklerini inceleyen ve hangi kodçözler (codec) kullanılarak sıkıştırıldığını belirleyen bir konsol aracıdır. Bir müzik CD'sinin MP3 dosyalarından mı yoksa orjinal kaynağından mı oluşturulduğunu kontrol etmek için yararlıdır. Testler auCDtect'in %95'ten yüksek bir doğruluk oranına sahip olduğunu gösteriyor.

Update.Comment: Add Turkish translation of summary/description of the package.
Update.Name: Doruk Fişek

Source.Name: audacious
Source.Summary: A versatile and handy media player
Beep-media-player benzeri bir çoklu ortam oynatıcısı
Source.Description: Audacious is a media player based on the BMP music playing application. Its primary goals are usability and usage of current desktop standards.
Beep-media-player benzeri bir çoklu ortam oynatıcısı

Package.Name: libaudacious
Package.Summary: Package that contains library and header files for Audacious

Source.Name: mac
Source.Description: Monkey's Audio (APE) is a fast and easy way to losslessly compress digital music.
Monkey's Audio (APE), müzikleri kayıpsız sıkıştırmanın hızlı ve kolay bir yoludur.

Update.Comment: Update doc path and add autoreconf to remove unused direct deps for 2009, fix dodoc.

Source.Description: libsidplay2 is a C64 SID player library.

Update.Comment: Add translations and description, use mirror.

Source.Name: uade
Source.Description: UADE, plays old Amiga tunes through UAE emulation and cloned m68k-assembler Eagleplayer API
UADE, eski Amiga müziklerini UAE emülasyonu ve klonlanmış m68k-çevirici EaglePlayer API'si ile çalar.

Update.Comment: * Remove functions that don't exist in Audacious 2.3 * Add missing runtime dep, strict doc dir, add translations.xml and Turkish package info.

Source.Description: Plugins for Audacious
Audacious için eklentiler

Source.Name: qcomicbook
Source.Summary: An image viewer specifically designed to handle comic books
Source.Description: QComicBook is a viewer for comic book archives (cbz, cbr, cbt). QComicBook has specific features like page preview, thumbnails view, bookmarks, manga mode for easing comicbook reading.

QComicBook cbz, cbr, cbt biçimindeki çizgi roman arşivlerini görüntülemek için kullanılır. Sayfa ön görünümü, sayfa döşeme, yer imi, mangalar için sayfa sırasını ters gösterme gibi çizgi roman okumayı kolaylaştırıcı özellikleri bulunuyor.

Update.Comment: * Use standard directories for cache and bookmarks file obtained from QDesktopServices. * Brazilian Portuguese, Finnish, French, Italian, Polish, Spanish and Ukrainian translations added. * Active web page and email links in 'About' dialog. * Shorten path names in 'Recently opened' menu. * Fixed regression: display image size info in statusbar.
Update.Name: Doruk Fişek

Update.Comment: Version bump: * implemented true continuous viewing mode. 'Continuous scrolling' option moved to 'View' menu. * removed 'Forward two pages in two pages mode' option. * new and improved 'System Information' dialog. * fixed splash screen showing an put a new splash screen. * fixed bug in subdirectories handling that resulted in missing images * fixed bug with p7zip archiver detection that could result in crash when opening .7z archives * added option to embed page numbers on displayed page * properly clear empty areas when displaying 2 pages of different size * fixed freezing when unpacking some archives (in particular zip) * fixed crash when opening archives via 'Recently opened' menu * thumbnails are now saved with sha1-hashed file names * add icon tag
Update.Name: Doruk Fişek

Update.Comment: Update doc path, remove strict deps for 2009.
Update.Name: Doruk Fişek

Source.Name: transKode
Source.Summary: KDE/QT frontend for various audio transcoding tools
Çeşitli ses dönüştürme araçları için KDE/QT arayüzü
Source.Description: transKode est une façade (frontend) KDE/QT pour différents outils de transcodage audio. Il contien également un script utilisable au sein d'Amarok.
transKode is a KDE/QT frontend for various audio transcoding (conversion) tools. It also contains a script for use within Amarok.
transKode çeşitli ses dönüştürme araçları için KDE/QT arayüzüdür. Amarok'un içinden kullanılabilmesini de sağlayan bir betik ile beraber geliyor.

Update.Comment: Fix sandbox violations, add qt3 and kdelibs dependencies, remove non-mandatory streamripper dependency.
Update.Name: Doruk Fişek

Update.Comment: Fixed for adding to pardus (kde) menu.
Update.Name: Ertan Argüden

Update.Comment: Version bump and update Turkish translation.
Update.Name: Doruk Fişek

Source.Name: shntool
Source.Description: Shntool is a multi-purpose wave data processing and reporting utility.
Shntool çok işlevli bir wav dosyası işleme ve raporlama aracıdır.

Update.Comment: Add more docs + Version bump : * cat mode: fixed bug that prevented use of the -d option * allow fix mode to fix (essentially postpad) just one file * added new global -F option to specify a file containing input filenames
Update.Name: Doruk Fişek

Source.Name: shorten
Source.Description: Shorten is a fast, low complexity audio compressor. It can operate in both lossy and lossless modes.
Shorten hızlı ve basit bir ses sıkıştırıcısıdır. Hem kayıpsız hem kayıplı sıkıştıracak şekilde çalışabilir.

Source.Name: rpl
Source.Description: rpl is a text replacement utility. It will replace strings with new strings in multiple text files. It can work recursively over directories and supports limiting the search to specific file suffixes.

rpl bir metin değiştirme aracıdır. Birden fazla metin dosyasında eşlenen metinleri yenileri ile değiştirecektir. Alt dizinleri özyinelemeli olarak tarayabilir ve arama/değiştirme işlemini sadece belirli uzantılı dosyalara uygulayabilir.

Update.Comment: Version bump, only fixes compilation issues.
Update.Name: Doruk Fişek

Source.Name: torrentinfo
Source.Description: TorrentInfo is a simple command-line tool that parses .torrent files and provides a summary of their contents.
TorrentInfo .torrent dosyalarını inceleyerek, içeriklerine ilişkin özet bilgisi veren basit bir komut satırı aracıdır.

Source.Name: fdupes
Source.Description: FDupes is a program for identifying or deleting duplicate files residing within specified directories. Such files are found by comparing file sizes and MD5 signatures, followed by a byte-by-byte comparison.

FDupes, belirlenen dizinlerde eş dosyaları tespit etmek ve/ya silmek için kullanılan bir yazılımdır. Dosyaların eş olmasını öncelikle dosya boyutu, daha sonra MD5 imzası ve son olarak da bayt karşılaştırılmasının sonucuna göre belirler.

Source.Name: navilink
Source.Summary: NaviGPS Data Transfer via Serial USB
NaviGPS Seri USB Portundan Veri Aktarımı
Source.Description: This is a simple perl script that implements the NaviLink protocol to communicate with a Locosys NaviGPS via serial USB.
Navilink protokolüyle bir Locosys NaviGPS ile seri USB portundan bağlantı kurarak veri aktarımı yapan basit bir perl betiğidir.

Update.Comment: Version bump, remove unnecessary build dep.
Update.Name: Doruk Fişek

Source.Name: josm
Source.Description: JOSM is a feature-rich offline editor for the experienced OSM mapper. It supports stand alone GPX tracks, GPX track data from the OSM database and existing nodes, line segments and metadata tags from the OSM database.

JOSM, deneyimli OSM haritacılarına yönelik zengin özelliklere sahip bir çevirim-dışı düzenleyicisidir. Bağımsız GPX izlerinin yanı sıra; OSM veritabanından GPX izlerini, mevcut düğümlerini, hat parçalarını ve etiketlerini kullanabilir.

Update.Comment: Version bump to new stable, update doc path for 2009.
Update.Name: Doruk Fişek

Source.Name: gpsbabel
Source.Description: GPSBabel converts waypoints, tracks, and routes between popular GPS receivers and mapping programs. It also has powerful manipulation tools for such data.
GPSBabel durak noktaları, izler ve rotaların yaygın GPS alıcılar ve haritalama programları arasında biçem dönüşümlerini yapar. Bu verileri işlemek için güçlü araçlara da sahiptir.

Update.Comment: Update doc path for 2009, remove non-existant doc.
Update.Name: Doruk Fişek

Source.Name: merkaartor
Source.Description: This is a Qt4-based editor for the OpenStreetMap with features such as map view near-WYSIWYG, style editor, transparent display of map features, support for handling seperate highways, import NMEA-files, etc.

Açık Sokak Haritası (OpenStreetMap) için bir Qt4 tabanlı harita düzenleyicisi olan Merkaartor'un stil düzenleyici, harita özelliklerinin saydam gösterilmesi, bağımsız otoyol desteği, NMEA dosyalarının içe aktarılmabilesi, WYSIWYG tarzı düzenleme gibi birçok özelliği bulunuyor.

Update.Comment: Version bump, add missing qt-webkit dependency.
Update.Name: Doruk Fişek

Update.Comment: * Fix initial viewport issue * Do not export incomplete features * Fix CSV import bugs * Use "GPX track width" setting even when not in "Simple track appearance" * Allow to pan with middle mouse button * Lat/lon grid fixes for non-othogonal projections * Fix for non-rthogonal projections, maximize the viewport in lat/lon * Handle empty style list in editor * Fix scale bar to take latitude into account. * Do not tag-match relation's children unless the type is "multippolygon" * Fix problem with "Bottom-left standard" TMS * Draw relations children dashed to avoid multiple parent drawing * Fix several issues with features dock. * Fix reappearance of deleted features. * Fix WayRemoveNodeCommand reversibility.
Update.Name: Doruk Fişek

Update.Comment: * Update homepage, add missing build time dependency * Fix crash when deleting relations * Allow to move complete relations * Fix first feature not OSM exported * Fix WMS'es in EPSG:4326 not showing * Fix don't overzoom on layer zoom and don't allow if the bbox is null) * Add a "portable" mode to merkaartor via command-line ("-p") * Added the possibility to show a lat/lon grid * Support for WMS-C servers * Support for "standard" TMS servers * Allow to tile (and cache) arbitrary WMS'es (only EPSG:4326 and google projection supported) * Allow google maps links and others in goto and download dialogs * Added a projection editor * Enhanced Relations support * Geo-tagging of photos inside Merkaartor, importing them without track layer and displaying them directly on the map * Improved SHP support * Support for JOSM remote protocol on port 8111 * Added Ramer-Douglas-Peucker simplification of ways (in Roads menu) * Many other minor tweaks and fixes
Update.Name: Doruk Fişek

Update.Comment: Version bump: * Virtual nodes allow fast creation of intermediary nodes * Allow to move node in Node creation mode * Only generate log files on request (--log) on release builds * Re-added tiled Yahoo! imagery as a plugin * NearMap Austalian TMS to the default list * Allow all platforms to connect to a gpsd backend * Support for OSM short link as input * Show distance measurement during area creation * Add language to changeset created_by * Add GlobeXplorer (DigitalGlobe) to default WMS list * Make the point where nodes are not displayed configurable * Keep directional arrows blue for oneway roads in "Show directional arrows - Always" mode. * GeoTIFF background plugin * Grabbing hand icon in single mouse mode * When in "single mouse button" mode, allow to cancel most operation with a right-click * "Zoom lock" mode. Zoom steps are locked to TMS ones and projection is locked to Mercator * Add a preference disallowing selection of relations when hidden * Various bugfixes
Update.Name: Doruk Fişek

Update.Comment: Update tarball sha1sum (includes non-trivial fix), add translations.xml, remove optional dependency, add qt-webkit dependency since it's a seperate package now.
Update.Name: Doruk Fişek

Update.Comment: Version bump : * Switch to API 0.6, remove support for API 0.5 * Add a Features dock displaying the features in the current viewport * Alternative way of drawing GPX tracks * Support for proxy authentication * Ability to create a junction between to crossing roads, polygons of any number of sides, house numbers "Karlsruhe" style * Ability to rotate roads/areas * Spatial indexing of features for faster display with large downloaded areas * Support for multiple image layers * Support for multi-selection of layers; allow to show/hide or readonly several layers at once * Drag and drop re-ordering of layers * Plugin-based background layers * Ability to choose Qt style * Discardable dialog/messageboxes * Fixed a bugging graphical corruption on Intel chipsets when the "Show downloaded area" was selected. * Fixed problem with "center" + "center and zoom" from the properties dock. * Fixed nodes fetched by relations are incomplete and not completed by "download more". * Other minor tweaks and bug fixes
Update.Name: Doruk Fişek

Update.Comment: Update doc path and remove strict deps for 2009.
Update.Name: Doruk Fişek

Update.Comment: Version bump : * Fix in Name property inspector causes AV * Remove English language warning * Proper handling of the "Don't connect GPX nodes..." preference when set to 0. * Fit the style editor in 1024x600 resolution * Reflect in dirty dock the fact that multiple objects were changed together * Added threaded browser-based background image grabbing.
Update.Name: Doruk Fişek

Update.Comment: Version bump : * Support for KML import * Support for ESRI Shapefile import (albeit not enough tested ;-) * A new background image layer with a basic SHP map of the world * Improved Geotagging pictures support * A "Style" dock * Readonly layers * A native SVG renderer to export your custom maps * A custom QT style * A "one-mouse-button" interaction preference * Many other features and bugfixes
Update.Name: Doruk Fişek

Update.Comment: Version bump to stable release, use official logo, change menu category.
Update.Name: Doruk Fişek

Source.Name: moodin-ksplash-themes
Source.Description: Two ksplash themes that can be shown during the initialization and loading process of KDE desktop environment.
KDE masaüstü ortamının yüklenmesi sırasında gösterilebilen iki adet ksplash teması.

Source.Description: FooBillard is a 3D 8ball, 9ball, snooker and carambol game.
FooBillard, 8 top, 9 top, snooker ve karambol oynanabilen üç boyutlu bilardo oyunudur.

Update.Name: Ozan Çağlayan

Source.Name: maniadrive
Source.Description: Arcade car game on acrobatic tracks, with a quick and nervous gameplay (tracks almost never exceed one minute), and featuring a network mode.
Akrobasi pistlerinde ister yerel, ister ağ ve internet üzerinden yarış oyunu. Hızlı düşünmeli ve oynamalısınız, çünkü bölümlerin neredeyse hiçbiri bir dakikadan uzun sürmez.

Paket, Crack Attack oyununun müzik dosyalarını içerir.

Source.Name: frozen-bubble
Source.Description: Frozen Bubble is a Puzzle Bubble clone written in Perl with network support; full-featured, colorful animated penguin eyecandy, 100 levels of 1p game, hours and hours of 2p game, a level-editor, 3 professional quality 20-channel music tracks, 15 stereo sound effects, 7 unique graphical transition effects.

Frozen Bubble Puzzle Bubble oyununun ağ desteği içeren benzeridir. Cıvıl cıvıl görüntüler, tek oyuncu için 100 seviye, ağ üzerinden karşılıklı oynama imkânı, seviye editörü, 20 kanallı ve birbirinden kaliteli 3 şarkı, 15 stereo ses efekti, 7 grafik geçiş efekti içerir.

Update.Comment: Change icon path for the package-manager icon tag to work.
Update.Name: Doruk Fişek

Update.Comment: Update doc path and remove strict deps for 2009, add more docs.
Update.Name: Doruk Fişek

Update.Comment: Version bump to new stable. Changes since release 15 : * more options in LAN/NET games (continue game when players leave; disable player targetting) * fixed abort during a multiplayer game with a player in lowest graphics mode * much faster Internet servers listing (parallel discovery) * add ability to record and replay games; also add ability to save frames from records * geolocalized nicks in server lounge
Update.Name: Doruk Fişek

Update.Comment: Version bump to latest git for testing the upcoming 2.2.0 release
Update.Name: Doruk Fişek

Update.Comment: Version bump to latest git for testing the upcoming 2.2.0 release

Source.Description: Funnyboat is a side scrolling arcade shooter game on a steamboat equipped with a cannon and the ability to jump.
Güllesiyle ateş etme ve zıplama yeteneğiyle buharlı geminizi kullanarak denizlerde ilerleyin.

Oyuncak tahta motoru sürerek bölümlerdeki objelerin hepsini toplayın.

Source.Description: GNUjump is a clone of the simple yet addictive game Xjump, adding new features like multiplaying, unlimited FPS, smooth floor falling, themable graphics etc.

Update.Comment: Update doc path and remove strict deps for 2009.
Update.Name: Doruk Fişek

Update.Comment: Drop Turkish translation for now since GnuJump's i18n support is buggy and causes the game to crash on some systems (#8839).

Update.Name: Doruk Fişek

Source.Name: lbreakout2
Source.Description: The polished successor to LBreakout offers you a new challenge in more than 50 levels with loads of new bonuses (goldshower, joker, explosive balls, bonus magnet, ...), maluses (chaos, darkness, weak balls, malus magnet, ...) and special bricks (growing bricks, explosive bricks, regenerative bricks, indestructible bricks, chaotic bricks). And if you're through with all the levels you can create complete new levelsets with the integrated easy-to-use level editor or challenge other people via LAN or Internet in either deathmatch or normal levelsets.

LBreakout'un geliştirilmiş hali 50'den fazla seviye, yeni bonuslar (altın yağmuru, joker, patlatan toplar, bonus mıknatısı, ...), kötü şeyler (kaos, karanlık, zayıf toplar, kötü şey mıknatısı, ...) ve özel tuğlalar (büyüyen tuğlalar, patlayan tuğlalar, yenilenen tuğlalar, yok edilemeyen tuğlalar, kaotik tuğlalar, ...) içerir. Ve tüm bölümleri bitirirseniz kullanımı kolay seviye editörüyle yeni seviye paketleri yapabilir veya başlarıyla yerel ağda veya internette oynayabilirsiniz.

Update.Comment: Version bump: * All sounds now have sample rate 22050 to prevent poor on-the-fly conversion of cheap sound cards. * Fixed a bug that cut the first few entries from the level set list in the menu (so you have more to play now). * Some english typos have been fixed. * The quick help now has text with proper transparency.
Update.Name: Doruk Fişek

Update.Comment: Version bump: * Swearing disabled by default * Translation updates * Added new levelsets
Update.Name: Doruk Fişek

Update.Comment: Update doc path, remove strict deps for 2009; add icon tag, add a latin1 Turkish translation.
Update.Name: Doruk Fişek

Update.Comment: Removed extra levelsets, too much space, very little to gain
Update.Name: Onur Küçük

Source.Name: blobwars
Source.Summary: Platform game about a blob and his quest to rescue MIAs from an alien invader
Bir damlayı canlandıracağınız eğlenceli bir platform oyunu
Source.Description: In Blob Wars:Metal Blob Solid, you take on the role of a fearless Blob agent, Bob. Bob's mission is to infiltrate the various enemy bases around the Blobs' homeworld and rescue as many MIAs as possible. But standing in his way are many vicious aliens, other Blobs who have been assimilated and the evil alien leader, Galdov.
Vatanını seven bir damla olarak, uzaylı istilacılardan asker arkadaşlarınızı kurtarın. Oldukça eğlenceli ve zorlu bir platform oyunu

Source.Name: blobAndConquer
Source.Summary: Mission and objective based 3D action game
Source.Description: Episode II of Blob Wars, a 3D action game featuring a variety of different weaponry and multiple objectives.
Çeşitli görev ve farklı silahların yer aldığı 3 boyutlu aksiyon oyunu. Blob Wars'un 2. bölümü.

Update.Comment: Version bump: * Fixes a bug in the save game system * All cutscenes are always played before a boss battle * Some typos were also fixed.
Update.Name: Doruk Fişek

Update.Comment: Version bump: * i18n support and Polish translations * Allows players better control over optional motion blur * Motion blur settings is now automatically disabled when outside of the actual game * Fix bugs in cheat options, font addition and sound/volume settings
Update.Name: Doruk Fişek

Update.Comment: Stable update. This update fixes some issues with loading missions and when changing or restarting a level when holding special items, such as grappling hooks.
Update.Name: H. İbrahim Güngör

Update.Comment: Remove unnecessary import, srctag variable and strict dependencies, add missing libsdl and mesa dependencies.
Update.Name: H. İbrahim Güngör

Source.Name: crack-attack-sounds
Source.Description: Additional files for Crack Attack game to add sound in-game.
Paket, Crack Attack oyunu ses dosyalarını içerir.

Update.Comment: Update archive address, add icon tag
Update.Name: Doruk Fişek

Source.Name: njam
Source.Summary: Network multiplayer or singleplayer Pacman-like game
Ağ üzerinden oynanabilen Pac-man türevi bir oyun
Source.Description: Njam is a full-featured cross-platform pacman-like game written in C++ using SDL library.
Njam, çokluplatform destekleyen, C++ dilinde ve SDL kütüphanelerini kullanarak hazırlanmış pac-man tarzı bir oyundur.

Update.Comment: Add icon tag, change icon type to png.
Update.Name: Doruk Fişek

Update.Comment: Update doc path, remove strict deps for 2009.
Update.Name: Doruk Fişek

Source.Name: supertux
Source.Description: Super Tux is a Super Mario inspired penguin platform game.
Super Mario benzeri penguenli platform oyunu

Update.Comment: Version bump and add missing dependencies.
Update.Name: Serdar Dalgıç

Update.Comment: Fix deps and gcc43 patch added
Update.Name: Murat Şenel

Source.Name: chromium-bsu
Source.Description: Chromium is an arcade shoot-em-up game with ship upgrade possibilities that needs a 3D-accelerated graphics card.

Update.Comment: Version bump: * Add new Swedish translation, translation updates * Add SDL_image texture loading backend * Fix keyboard handling at the end of level * Fix some issues found by valgrind * Add missing package dependencies
Update.Name: Doruk Fişek

Update.Comment: Update doc path, remove strict deps for 2009.
Update.Name: Doruk Fişek

Update.Comment: New branch, version bump for many fixes and features, add icon tag. Rename package to avoid confusion with Google's browser project.
Update.Name: Doruk Fişek

Update.Comment: Remove environment variable dependency and make the sound actually work
Update.Name: Onur Küçük

Source.Name: teeworlds
Source.Summary: Ağ üzerinden oynanabilen 2 boyutlu ateş etme oyunu
Source.Description: Teeworlds features cartoon-themed graphics and physics, and relies heavily on classic shooter weaponry and gameplay.
Teeworld eğlenceli grafik ve fizik kuralları olan, klasik ateş etme oyunu ve silahlarına dayanan 2 boyutlu bir oyundur.

Update.Comment: Depend on freeglut instead of glut
Update.Name: Doruk Fişek

Update.Comment: Reown and version bump. Fixes #11557. ChangeLog: - Purely a maintenance release, addresses a server crash bug, - Clears up some GUI issues and many small improvements.
Update.Name: H. İbrahim Güngör

Update.Comment: Remove unnecessary exports and strict dependencies, add missing mesa dependency
Update.Name: H. İbrahim Güngör

Update.Comment: Remove unused patch, update summary and description, add translations.xml
Update.Name: H. İbrahim Güngör

Update.Comment: * Version bump, add libsdl and glut dependency, takeover package * Add sample config files, update icons, overhaul patches * Move from glfw+portaudio to SDL * Voting, ban, demo play/recording support * Game balance fixes, support up to 16 players * Vsync fixed, tab completion in console * Prediction and game timer fixed so the game should be a lot smoother now.
Update.Name: H. İbrahim Güngör

Source.Name: tuxtype
Source.Description: "Tux Typing" is an educational typing tutor for children. It features several different types of gameplay, at a variety of difficulty levels.

Update.Comment: * Fish cascade backgrounds now selected randomly. * Fish cascade graphics now use true alpha channel rather than SDL colorkey. * Some fixes related to file location of custom word lists.
Update.Name: Doruk Fişek

Update.Comment: Version bump: * Word list editor * Much better background images and new music for the "fish cascade" * Significantly expanded word lists, phrase list and lessons * New translations
Update.Name: Doruk Fişek

Update.Comment: Version bump : * i18n and utf8 fixes * Cleanup of some scripting menu issues * Text drawing, background scaling and optimization improvements * Add translations.xml, fix summary * Update doc path, remove strict deps for 2009.
Update.Name: Doruk Fişek

Update.Comment: Version bump : * Fixed crashing bug in fullscreen fish cascade game * Safety checks for null pointers, array bounds violations, etc. * Tweaks to startup screen * Lessons menu now has the same look and feel of the other menus
Update.Name: Doruk Fişek

Update.Comment: Version bump. Many new features, many bugfixes over a period of four years (too many to list).
Update.Name: Doruk Fişek

Update.Comment: Added a desktop file for kmenu
Update.Name: Michael Austin

Source.Name: tuxmath
Source.Description: "Tux, of Math Command" ("TuxMath," for short) is an educational arcade game where you have to solve math problems, starring Tux, the Linux mascot!
Başrolde Linux maskotu Tux'ın olduğu, çocuklara özel eğitim amaçlı, matematik problemlerinin çözüldüğü bir oyun

Update.Comment: Add icon tag, change menu category (and use internal desktop file)
Update.Name: Doruk Fişek

Update.Comment: Version bump: * Text drawing, background scaling and optimization improvements * More strings have i18n support * Fix "Math Command Training Academy" lesson reset problem * 3 new menu icons and clean-up cloud icon * Check for indeterminate questions and to use the "comprehensive" method whenever multiple-operand questions are not needed. * Update doc path, remove strict deps for 2009.
Update.Name: Doruk Fişek

Update.Comment: Version bump, many new features, including i18n support and Turkish translation.
Update.Name: Doruk Fişek

Update.Comment: Version bump to svn r75 for cool new features.
Update.Name: Doruk Fişek

Update.Comment: Add a patch for makefile to fix installation
Update.Name: Murat Şenel

Source.Name: fish-fillets
Source.Description: Next generation of Fish Fillets Underwater puzzle game. Find your way out! You can toggle fullscreen with the F11 key.
Yeni nesil Fish Fillets zeka oyunu. Küçük balıkların doğru yolu bulmasına yardım edin. Çıkış acaba nerede... Oyunu tam ekran yapmak için F11 tuşunu kullanabilirsiniz.

Update.Comment: Version bump: * Fixed undefined behavior in the last levels where outgoing objects could be stopped by an obstacle. * Fixed strange background colors on the F10 and F1 screens.
Update.Name: Doruk Fişek

Update.Comment: Version bump: * Used sound frequency 44100 to prevent crackles. * Embedded intro video. * Enhanced graphics. * Faster undo, redo. * Updated translations. * 4 new levels. * Add support for translated images. * Prevented music restart on undo. * Fixed checking for solvable room before undo saving. * Fixed checking for second dead fish. * Remove strict deps and update doc path for 2009, update summary, add copyright.
Update.Name: Doruk Fişek

Update.Comment: Fix desktop files to make them XDG compliant
Update.Name: Ozan Çağlayan

Update.Comment: Gcc-4.3 patch and lua patch added
Update.Name: Murat Şenel

Update.Comment: Version bump for extra levels, undo support and bugfixes
Update.Name: Onur Küçük

Update.Comment: Version bump to fix table iterations for lua
Update.Name: Onur Küçük

Source.Name: ltris
Source.Description: LTris as a tetris clone which means you have a bowl with blocks falling down. By rotating and moving the blocks you try to assemble whole lines which then disappear. LTris has three modes for this: Classic is the classical one where you play until the bowl becomes filled, Figures resets the bowl contents to a new figure for each level and adds suddenly appearing tiles and lines later on and Multiplayer where up to three players either controlled by human or CPU compete and send completed lines to each other.

LTris bildiğiniz Tetris oyunudur. Yukarıdan aşağıya düşen blokları döndürerek ve hareket etirerek sıraları boşluk bırakmadan doldurma temeline dayanır, dolan sıralar silinir. LTris'in 3 seçeneği vardır: "Klasik", kutunun tamamı doluncaya kadar oynanır, "Şekiller" her bölümde kutunun şeklini değiştirir ve "ÇokOyunculu" birden fazla oyuncuyla oynanandır (ve istenen oyuncular bilgisayar tarafından oynanabilir).

Update.Comment: Version bump, fix Turkish translation for key bindings
Update.Name: Doruk Fişek

Update.Comment: Version bump: * Add icon tag, mark localedata correctly. * Missing include, bad memset calls and typos in english localization fixed. * Range of horizontal delay for block movement increased to allow less sensitive setting.
Update.Name: Doruk Fişek

Update.Comment: Version bump: * Translation updates * Highscore charts are now language independent * 'Block shadow' (to help aiming) is now enabled by default.
Update.Name: Doruk Fişek

Update.Comment: Remove strict deps, update doc path, change library linking seq (thanks to Onur) for 2009.
Update.Name: Doruk Fişek

Source.Name: neverball
Source.Description: Neverball is a 3D puzzle and action game in which you roll a ball by tilting the table to get the ball to a destination location.
Neverball masayı hareket ettirerek topun hareketlerinin yönetildiği 3B zeka ve beceri oyunudur.

Update.Comment: Add missing physfs dependency, close the bug #11726.
Update.Name: Serdar Dalgıç

Update.Comment: Version bump to fix inconsistent quoting in error messages
Update.Name: Onur Küçük

Update.Comment: Version bump to fix game startup
Update.Name: Onur Küçük

Update.Comment: Version bump Drag-and-drop ZIP archive support for installing game data (including level sets) No limits on the number of replays and sets you can have A more organized user directory layout The long-awaited ball selection screen was finally added Much improved ball control while in air A new volcano environment accompanied with original background music Slightly improved fake shadow UI tweaks across the board and many bug fixes
Update.Name: Onur Küçük

Source.Name: blockout2
Source.Description: Blockout2 is a free adaptation of the original BlockOut DOS game edited by California Dreams in 1989. BlockOut II has the same features of the original game with few graphic improvements. The score calculation is also nearly similar to the original game. BlockOut II has been designed by an addicted player for addicted players.
Blockout2, California Dreams şirketinin 1989 yılında piyasaya sürdüğü Blockout oyununun özgür adaptasyonudur. Grafik geliştirmeler içerir. Skor hesaplaması neredeyse aynıdır.

Update.Comment: Fix desktop files to make them XDG compliant
Update.Name: Ozan Çağlayan

Source.Name: pingus
Source.Description: Pingus is a free clone of the famous Lemmings game.
Pingus ünlü Lemmings oyununun benzeridir.

Update.Comment: Remove strict part of dependencies Fix for gcc44
Update.Name: Onur Küçük

Update.Comment: Fix desktop files to make them XDG compliant
Update.Name: Ozan Çağlayan

Update.Comment: Version bump, many new small but nice features and some bugfixes
Update.Name: Onur Küçük

Update.Comment: Version bump, many core components have been rewritten and cleaned up
Update.Name: Onur Küçük

Source.Name: pytraffic
Source.Description: PyTraffic is a computer version of the board puzzle Rush Hour. The goal is to remove the red car out of the grid through the slot on the right. To do this you have to slide the other cars out of the way.
PyTraffic "Kalabalık Saatler" (Rush Hour) bulmacasının bilgisayara uyarlanmışıdır. Amaç, kırmızı aracı haritadan çıkartabilmektir. Bunun için diğer araçları yolundan çekmeniz gerekir.

Source.Name: lmarbles
Source.Description: Puzzle game inspired by Atomix and written using the SDL library.
LMarbles, Atomix oyunundan yola çıkılarak hazırlanmış bir oyundur. Bilyeleri istenen yerlere yerleştirerek bulmacaları çözmeniz gerekir.

Update.Comment: Update doc path and remove strict deps for 2009, add icon tag.
Update.Name: Doruk Fişek

Source.Name: pathological
Source.Summary: Clone of the game "Logical" by Rainbow Arts
Source.Description: Path-o-Logical is a clone of the game "Logical" by Rainbow Arts. To solve a level, fill each wheel with four marbles of matching color. Various board elements such as teleporters, switches, filters, etc., make the game interesting and challenging. New levels can be created using your favorite text editor.

Rainbow Arts'ın Logical oyununun benzeri. Işınlama noktaları, düğmeler, filtreler ve benzeri bir çok aracı kullanarak her tekerleği eş renk toplarla doldurun. Üstelik herhangi bir düzmetin editörü kullanarak kendinize yeni seviyeler yapabilirsiniz.

Update.Comment: Update doc path for 2009, add icon tag.
Update.Name: Doruk Fişek

Update.Comment: Fix desktop files to make them XDG compliant
Update.Name: Ozan Çağlayan

Source.Name: fish-fillets-data
Source.Description: Contains Fish Fillets NG data files.
Fish Fillets NG oyununun veri dosyalarını içerir.

Source.Name: gmult
Source.Description: Multiplication Puzzle is a simple GTK+ 2 game that emulates the multiplication game found in Emacs. Basically, a multiplication problem is shown with all digits replaced by letters. Your job is to guess which letter represents which number.

Çarpma Bulmacası, Emacs'teki çarpma oyununun benzeri basit bir GTK+ 2 oyunudur. Tüm basamakların harflerle değiştirildiği bir çarpma problemi gösteriliyor. Sizin işiniz de, hangi harfe hangi rakamın karşılık geldiğini tahmin etmek.

Update.Comment: Version bump: Fix odd drag icons when in compiz. Translation updates.
Update.Name: Doruk Fişek

Update.Comment: Version bump: Translation updates, add icon tag.
Update.Name: Doruk Fişek

Update.Comment: Update doc path, remove strict deps for 2009.
Update.Name: Doruk Fişek

Update.Comment: Version bump : Updated Ido and Swedish; new Greek, Polish and Spanish translations.
Update.Name: Doruk Fişek

Update.Comment: Version bump for new nl, fi, zh_TW translations. Remove unnecessary docs.
Update.Name: Doruk Fişek

Source.Name: amoebax
Source.Summary: A cute and addictive action-puzzle game
Source.Description: Due to an awful mutation, some amoeba's have started to multiply and they will take hold of the world if you can't stop them. Fortunately the mutation made them too unstable and lining up four or more will kill them.

Update.Comment: Removed a music file which made strange noises on some systems.
Update.Name: Uğur Çetin

Source.Name: connectagram
Source.Description: Connectagram is a word unscrambling game. The board consists of several scrambled words that are joined together. You can choose the length of the words, the amount of words, and the pattern that the words are arranged in. The game provides a hint option for times when you are stuck, and features an online word lookup that fetches the definitions of each word from www.dict.org.

Connectagram bir sözcük tahmin etme oyunudur. Oyun tahtasında, birbiriyle birleştirilmiş ama harflerinin yerleri değiştirilmiş sözcükler bulunmaktadır. Sözcüklerin uzunluklarını, sayısını ve tahtadaki düzenleniş biçimlerini seçebiliyorsunuz. Takıldığınızda isterseniz ipucu alabiliyorsunuz. Bunun yanında Connectagram, kullanılan sözcüklerin anlamlarını www.dict.org adresinden bakıp, önünüze getirebiliyor.

Source.Name: wormux-bonusmaps
Source.Description: wormux-bonusmaps contains extra maps for Wormux.
wormux-bonusmaps Wormux için ek haritalar içerir.

Source.Name: freecol
Source.Description: Game starts in 1492 and the object of the game is to colonize America , build a powerful nation, declare your independence and survive the attack of the King's forces.
Oyun 1492'de başlıyor. Oyunun amacı Amerika'yı kolonileştirmek, güçlü bir ulus inşa etmek, bağımsızlığınızı ilan etmek ve kralın kuvvetlerinin saldırısına karşı ayakta kalmak.

Update.Comment: New alpha: * Turkish support enabled, not buggy anymore * new theme * selectable rules * custom difficulty * new goods type "grain" * "clear forest" accelerator is now "C", "center" is now "Ctrl-C" * display the last sale price of goods at native settlements * better client-server communication, reduces synchronization issues * localization files are now encoded as UTF-8 * many bugs fixed, some quite old :-) Changes to increase Colonization compatibility: * secondary production no longer benefits from plowing * horse production consumes less food * treasure from destroyed native settlements is now closer to the original * choice of cargo to loot when winning a naval battle * clearing a tile will sometimes uncover a resource * Spanish national advantage now includes attack bonus against natives
Update.Name: Doruk Fişek

Update.Comment: Bump to latest stable: More memory leaks that caused the game to slow down have been found and fixed, as have a number of annoying bugs.
Update.Name: Doruk Fişek

Update.Comment: Bump to latest stable: * Several serious bugs, including a memory or reference leak have been fixed * A graphical modification (mod) adds new graphics for goods and resources. * Translation updates
Update.Name: Doruk Fişek

Update.Comment: Bump to latest stable: * Fix several bugs, including a combat bug that made it possible to capture colonies that still had armed defenders. * Keyboard accelerators are now available for virtually all mapboard actions, including movement * New "Hutzli" graphical mod.
Update.Name: Doruk Fişek

Update.Comment: Bump to latest stable: * Fix prevention of the REF from landing in the New World * Fixed a serious bug in privateer combat * Many other fixes. * Add parameter support to freecol script. * Add program icon (png) as a seperate file. * Add Debian man page.
Update.Name: Doruk Fişek

Update.Comment: Bump to latest stable: * AI breeds horses more effectively * AI uses pioneers more effectively * AI distributes workers more effectively * AI creates and assigns soldiers more effectively * AI constructs more advanced buildings * Building graphics (taken from NewCol and SweCol project) * New images for forests and beaches * Redesigned panels and dialogs using MigLayout * The colony panel, colopedia panel and report panel now remember their size * More useful for small displays (1024x600) * Map shows national borders * Stockades no longer prevent abandoning a colony * Together with a custom house, de Witt circumvents boycotts * The Treaty of Utrecht
Update.Name: Doruk Fişek

Update.Comment: Bump to new alpha of new development version for testing.
Update.Name: Doruk Fişek

Update.Comment: Bump to alpha of new development version for testing.
Update.Name: Doruk Fişek

Update.Comment: Version bump : Many bugfixes, translation updates.
Update.Name: Doruk Fişek

Update.Comment: Version bump to new stable : * Ability to define gameplay mechanics, change the game rules * Units now slide between tiles while moving. * New terrain graphics. * New music and sound effects. * Named regions and nicer placement of native settlements. * New nations added: Portuguese, Swedish, Danish and Russian * Games with up to eight European players are now supported. * A lot more new features and bugfixes.
Update.Name: Doruk Fişek

Update.Comment: Version bump to new alpha for testing.
Update.Name: Doruk Fişek

Update.Comment: Version bump to new alpha for testing.
Update.Name: Doruk Fişek

Update.Comment: Version bump to latest svn for testing.
Update.Name: Doruk Fişek

Update.Comment: Version bump to new alpha for testing.
Update.Name: Doruk Fişek

Source.Name: hedgewars
Source.Description: Hedgewars is a turn based strategy game but the real buzz is from watching the devastation caused by those pesky hedgehogs with those fantastic weapons - sneaky little blighters with a bad attitude!.
Hedgewars, tur tabanlı bir strateji oyunu ama işin esas eğlencesi o sinir bozucu kirpilerin ellerindeki çeşit çeşit silahlarla yarattıkları yıkımı izlemekte.

Update.Comment: Version bump: * Many new hats, hats visible while using rope and blowtorch * New weapons: Exploding barrels, birdy weapon, poisoning effect, dud mines, * Alt weapon preview on rope, parachute * UFO changed to homing bee * AI uses new weapons, aware of fire, can fight in artillery mode * New options in ammo editing - crate probability, delays * Option of semi-opaque hog name tags to avoid fail when land is hidden by name * New sounds: British voicepack, walk sound for hedgehogs, additional bounce sounds * Notification sound when people join your room * Hogs react to throwing grenades / dynamite and when near them * New visual effects: dust on fall impact, smoke, shotgun shells, blink team name on start of turn, hogs pulling weapons out, falling flakes kicked by explosion and more * View ammo menu when not your turn * Contextual help when using weapons menu * 3D effect for waves * Fade effect when starting/stopping game * New game modes - place hedgehog, king mode, randomise starts, allies share ammo, disable girders * Shift + direction to turn without moving * New font for CJK text and better CJK detection * Team flags * Graphic of crate contents when picking up weapon/utility * Splashes/droplets when things fall in the water * 45 degree bounce when throwing grenades * Information on game rules when starting game * Knockball map (scripted map) * Maze generator for new random maps * new crazy map template * New olympics, desert themes, visual updates to many other themes * Background texture for land for a 3d effect on explosions * Frontend able to delete teams * Ignore/friends lists in frontend * Updated options in frontend: independent toggles for frontend/game sound/music, select locale * Lua scripting for easy creation of missions and special maps. * Many bug fixes, speed optimizations, translation updates
Update.Name: Doruk Fişek

Update.Comment: * New weapons, maps, theme, visual effects, sounds, training modes * Dynamically zoom in/out in the battlefield with mouse wheel. * Updated graphics * Team chat * Remember net password * Implement room control delegation when host's connection fails * Colorize chat events in engine * Frontend improvements * Fix crash in replay caused by speech bubbles * Fix some desync causes * Fix rope bugs * Fix bugs in weapon selection code
Update.Name: Doruk Fişek

Update.Comment: Update doc path, remove strict deps for 2009.
Update.Name: Doruk Fişek

Update.Comment: Version bump : * Speech Bubbles - during your turn, have your hedgehog express himself. In chat, use "regular speech" 'thought bubbles' -action bubbles- with the quote marks completely surrounding the entire typed text. You can also use /hsa /hta /hya to fire off a bubble at the moment of your attack. * New graves and hats. Animated stars in the frontend and a new theme. Add missing graphics and maps. * Two new taunts - a /shrug and /juggle -ing. * New mobster voice! A remake of the default voice set. New theme music. * New game modes. Karma, any injury you caused (not including drowning) is dealt to you too, unless invulnerable. Vampirism, where you feed off damage you deal, gaining 80% of it. Artillery, where your hog can not move about. * Options to control mine quantity and timer. Those are made use of in a Minefield scheme/weapon set as one of the default sets. * The sniper rifle demonstrated in previous news post. * Various fixes such as: prevent desync when a player quits, fix a crash at end of game in reduced quality, bug in synching changes to map and scheme in room, fix bug in disconnection from server, hedgehogs keep hats while jumping, bug in rope/parachute when drowning with active girder/teleport, bug in rope that on rare occasion deleted it on firing.
Update.Name: Doruk Fişek

Update.Comment: Version bump : * Many many more terrain generation options, maps can be huge, very small, caverns, caves, stepping stones, etc. * To accompany these new terrain generation options there are new themes and musical tracks * On top of this there are a ton of brand new preset maps, have your hogs fight on city scapes and lazy old men in hammocks! * Lots of new hats (total of 79 now!) and to add to the hats, some new voice work * A new type of weapon called a utility has been added, these weapons drop in utiltiy crates and boost your hedgehogs abilities, low gravity, laser sight, extra time, extra damage, forcefield * Alongside weaponsets we now have "scheme sets", this means you can save gameplay options into a scheme for later use. We've also added a whole load more options for you to use in your schemes, you can add borders to any map, disable mines, enable low gravity, make all hogs invincible, and more. * The server has been given a major upgrade, you can now reserve your name with your hedgewars.org account. At the moment there are no stats in game, but we may already begin tracking them to display them later, so remember to log in! We are also integrating the game with the website. * A new Despeckling gameplay feature removes stray pixels from the terrain after fires/big explosions * Graphics updates, language updates, music and sound updates across the board * Demos can now be played without the frontend * Weapons and hogs can now bounce off of the water if they hit it at the right speed/angle.. this can be used in a very interesting way with the rope ;) * Hedgewars can now generate your team for you if you're feeling lazy, it also generates random teams for "quick play" mode, and even uses appropriate hats. I.e. it will generate a ninja team, with ninja names/hats! * Changed girder functionality completely to make it a much more interesting and fun weapon! * Many more fixes and feature.
Update.Name: Doruk Fişek

Update.Comment: Version bump : * Voicepacks, customize your teams voice! * Nice new visual statistics page after the match * Precise aiming, hold shift to aim more accurately * Improved lobby chat * Remote Control Plane weapon * A couple of additions to customization content (i.e. grave / fort / hat content) * Additional sound effects * Various tweaks and bug fixes
Update.Name: Doruk Fişek

Update.Comment: Version bump : * Better menu icon * Massive number of network play bugfixes * Now spectating works for those who joined after game start * New Drill rocket weapon * New Napalm strike weapon * New Super awesome super weapon * Land can now be set to be indestructable * Six brand new maps using new themes * Lots of new forts * Hellish hand grenade reworked * Brand new lobby and lobby chat * Spread of Melon Bomb fragments improved * Blowtorch bug fixes and improvements * Fixed a crash bug that occured when the engine had no room to place all Hedgehogs * More delay after jump, less delay after small fall for hedgehog * Limit max chat message length to 300 characters * Ammo menu no longer closes when user clicks on not yet available weapon * Ammo scheme bug fixes * Fire effect improved
Update.Name: Doruk Fişek

Source.Name: freeciv
Source.Description: Freeciv is a free turn-based multiplayer strategy game in which each player becomes the leader of a civilization, fighting to obtain the ultimate goal: To become the greatest civilization.
Çok oyuncu destekli, tarafların sıra ile oynadığı strateji oyunu. Her oyuncu bir ulusu yöneterek en yüksek amaca, yani en güçlü ırk olmaya çalışıyor.

Update.Comment: Version bump to maintenance release, switch to better SDL client, fixes bug #6612
Update.Name: Onur Küçük

Update.Comment: Version bump to new stable with fancy graphics, fixes bug #6470
Update.Name: Onur Küçük

Update.Comment: Version bump to fix security problem in attributes code
Update.Name: Onur Küçük

Source.Name: warzone2100
Source.Description: Warzone 2100 is a real-time strategy game developed by Pumpkin Studios and published by Eidos Interactive. Although comparable to Earth 2150 in many significant respects, it does contain aspects that are unique. These include various radar technologies, a greater focus on artillery and counter-battery technologies, more frequent in-game cinematic updates as gameplay progresses, and a different vehicle design method. It was released in 1999 for both PC and Playstation. It's suggested to set display depth to 24bit.

Warzone 2100 Punpkin Studios tarafından geliştirilen ve Eidos Interactive tarafından dağıtılan, ilk sürümü 1999 yılında PC ve Playstation için hazırlanan bir gerçek zamanlı strateji oyunudur. Earth 2150 ile bir çok benzerlik gösterse de kendine özel bir çok özellik içermektedir. Bu özellikler arasında çeşitli radar teknikleri, değişik silah sistem teknolojileri, oyun ilerlerken konu ile ilgili gösterilen küçük videolar ve değişik araç tasarlama sistemi sayılabilir. Ekran renk derinliğinin 24bit olarak ayarlanması tavsiye edilir.

Update.Comment: Depend on freeglut instead of glut.
Update.Name: Doruk Fişek

Update.Comment: Version bump, remove default resolution patch.

Source.Name: wormux
Source.Description: Have the mascots of your favorite free softwares battle in the Wormux arena. Exterminate your opponent in a 2D toon style scenery and a funny environment using dynamite, grenades, baseball bat, bazookas, ...
Dinamit, el bombası, beyzbol sopası, bazuka ve diğer birçok silahı kullanarak, 2 boyutlu karton stili alanlarda rakiplerinizi yok edin.

Update.Comment: Version bump: * Bugfixes: * New skin: bugzilla; New map: chess map, New music: circux, diabolicux, exoticux, woodlux * Menu improvement: better management of tabs on small screen. * Update translations * The rope of grapple no longer gets stuck in ground. * Fix network games between specific computers * A bug has been fixed which prevented the Bugzilla team to have more then three players. * Poisoned characters die now when they have to less health. * Fix shoot key handling when user exceeds the weapon max strength * Fix: Do not apply damage from explosion twice * Fix rope size check when attaching * Fix some memory leaks * Many other bug fixes
Update.Name: Doruk Fişek

Update.Comment: Version bump: * New artificial intelligence is smart. * Improved quality of network games * Two new teams: Postfix and Hexley * Add 3 new maps. Delete 3 old ones. * Some display and gameplay improvements * A lot of other improvements and bug fixes
Update.Name: Doruk Fişek

Update.Comment: Version bump : * Fix handling of key event during the game * Fix new sound player warning * Fix several network bugs related to random generator * Fix keep-alive connexion to index server when hosting a server from the game * Fix crash when invalid display resolution requested * Fix "play in loop" options for network games * Multi-layer sky * New maps * Small skin animation enhancements * Camera enhancement * Refresh the public network games list * Weapon behavior: gnu, supertux and polecat now explode when pressing space, M16 repeats shoot * Lefthand-operated mouse option * Automatically create personal directories for maps, teams and game_mode * Do not overlink index server and game server binaries * Translation updates
Update.Name: Doruk Fişek

Update.Comment: Version bump : - Dedicated game server - Camera improvements - New sounds - Key repeat handling in menu - Various bug fixes - Translations updates - Move to strategy game section in desktop menu
Update.Name: Doruk Fişek

Update.Comment: Update doc path, remove strict deps, change dep name for 2009.
Update.Name: Doruk Fişek

Update.Comment: Version bump : - New skins with new animations, new sounds - Better team menu editor - New game interface - Small AI enhancements - Fix somes crashes and small graphical bugs
Update.Name: Doruk Fişek

Update.Comment: Fix desktop files to make them XDG compliant
Update.Name: Ozan Çağlayan

Source.Name: wesnoth
Source.Summary: Fantezi temalı sıralı oynanan bir strateji oyunu
Source.Description: The Battle for Wesnoth is a turn-based strategy game with a fantasy theme. Build up a great army, gradually turning raw recruits into hardened veterans. In later games, recall your toughest warriors and form a deadly host against whom none can stand! Choose units from a large pool of specialists, and hand-pick a force with the right strengths to fight well on different terrains against all manner of opposition.

The Battle for Wesnoth;sıra tabanlı,fantezi konulu,strateji oyunudur.Büyük ordular oluşturup, derece derece acemi askerleri kıdemli birliklere dahil eder. Sonraki oyunda en dayanıklı savaşçı askerlerinizi önünde hiç kimsenin duramayacağı öldürücü bir güce dönüştürür. Birliklerinizi profesyonellerin olduğu ekip içinden seçip, farklı savaş alanlarında her türlü düşman kuvvetlerine karşı savaşacak doğru güçteki birliklerinizi oluşturun.

Update.Comment: Version bump for bugfixes and translation updates.
Update.Name: Doruk Fişek

Update.Comment: - Add missing dependencies. - Major version bump to latest stable version 1.8. - Wesnoth local server is now available with many enhancements.
Update.Name: Serdar Dalgıç

Source.Name: lincity-ng
Source.Description: A city management simulation game based on a complete 3D isometric engine and a modern GUI.
Modern kullanıcı arabirimli, 3B izometrik grafik motoru üzerinde çalışan şehir yönetimi benzetimci oyunu.

Update.Comment: Version bump fixes bug #9107 added water as a new resource, also it is possible to build bridges across rivers The file format used to save games changed but old save games are still supported, fixes bug #9107
Update.Name: Onur Küçük

Update.Comment: Fix crash when population is down to zero, add Turkish translation, fixes bug #6698
Update.Name: Onur Küçük

Update.Comment: Minor version bump for gameplay fixes
Update.Name: Onur Küçük

Source.Name: dreamchess
Source.Description: Dreamchess is a 3D chess game with its own moderately strong chess engine. You can also use any other XBoard-compatible chess engine, including the popular Crafty and GNU Chess.
Dreamchess kendi satranç motoruna sahip üç boyutlu bir satranç oyunudur. Dreamchess ile Crafty ve GNU Chess gibi XBoard-uyumlu başka herhangi bir satranç motorunu da kullanabilirsiniz.

Update.Comment: Depend on freeglut instead of glut
Update.Name: Doruk Fişek

Update.Comment: Rebuild for new Pisi, strict doc path
Update.Name: Doruk Fişek

Source.Name: pouetchess
Source.Description: PouetChess is a 3D chess game using FAILE as embedded engine for AI.
PouetChess, yapay zeka için gömülü FAILE motorunu kullanan üç boyutlu bir satranç oyunudur.

Update.Comment: * Incorporate Gentoo and Debian patches * Turn off scons optimization flag (messes with Pardus compilation flags) * Change menu category to board games * Correct configure fix * Add docs * Elaborate package description
Update.Name: Doruk Fişek

Source.Name: libmcs
Source.Summary: Abstracts the storage of configuration settings away from applications
Source.Description: MCS is a library and set of userland tools which abstract the storage of configuration settings away from userland applications.
MCS, kullanıcıların çalıştırdığı uygulamaların ayarları saklamasını uygulamadan soyutlayan, bir kitaplık ve kullanıcıların çalıştırabileceği araçlardan oluşur.

Update.Comment: Version bump, add missing kdelibs dep, use strict doc dir, fix homepage, fix summary/description, add Turkish package info translation, add app:console isa tag.
Update.Name: Doruk Fişek

Source.Name: jam
Source.Description: Remplacement avancé pour l'outil de développement "make"
Advanced replacement for the development tool "make".
Geliştirme araçlarından "make" programına alternatif
Reemplazo avancado para la herramienta de desarrollo "make"

Source.Name: tuxcards
Source.Description: With TuxCards it is possible to create as many different entries or notes as you wish. Everytime you add a new one and you think your new entry belongs to the same topic as notes you already have, then you may decide to group them and to create a kind of "folder" where you store them all together.
Tuxcards ile istediğiniz sayıda not yazmak mümkün. Tutulan notlar hiyerarşik olarak oluşturulabilen çeşitli "klasör"lerde gruplanabiliyor.

Update.Comment: * Fix crash in a special case during encryption. * The font that is set for the editor (via options dialog) is now also used as default font for entries in RTF format. * Activate command line options. * Make keyboard shortcuts for adding and deleting entries available. * Improve user interaction: If a new entry is created, the tree does automatically select this new entry. In addition the editor receives the keyboard input focus. * Change default font and size for tree and editor. * Change default textformat for new entries from ASCII to RTF. * In the run where configuration file is written from scratch, do not ask for saving, if no changes where done. * Fix crash when scrolling within the tree and loading a new data file immediately afterwards. * Fix potential error: Use file system independent method to retrieve the base file name from the absolute file name. * Localization support and German translation. * Correct spelling in configuration dialog. * Fix application crash where only one entry existed when moving an entry up and down. * Remove bug when encrypting text during a very special scenario.
Update.Name: Doruk Fişek

Update.Comment: Version bump to QT4 port, add icon tag. Remove strict deps, update doc path for 2009.
Update.Name: Doruk Fişek
